mapper.select: select top 1 misnum from tb_da023 where misdate = #{misdate} and cltcd=#{cltcd} order by misdate, misnum
select top 1 misnum from tb_da025 where misdate = #{misdate} and cltcd=#{cltcd} order by misdate, misnum
select max(misnum) from tb_da023 where misdate = #{misdate}
select max(misnum) from tb_da025 where misdate = #{misdate}
select max(seq) from tb_da024 where misdate = #{misdate} and misnum = #{misnum} and cltcd = #{cltcd}
select max(seq) from tb_da026 where misdate = #{misdate} and misnum = #{misnum} and cltcd = #{cltcd}

select B.cltcd as cltcd, Left(B.misdate,4) + '-' + substring(B.misdate, 5,2)+ '-' + substring(B.misdate, 7,2) as misdate, B.misnum, B.seq, B.pcode, B.pname, B.psize, B.punit, B.qty, B.uamt, B.samt, B.addamt, B.amt, A.acorp, pbonsa, pmodel, pcolor from TB_DA024 B WITH (NOLOCK) , cif A WITH (NOLOCK) , TB_DA023 C WITH (NOLOCK) where B.misdate + B.misnum = C.misdate + C.misnum AND isnull(C.delflag, '') <> 'Y' AND B.cltcd = A.acorp1 + CAST(A.acorp2 as varchar) AND C.cltcd = A.acorp1 + CAST(A.acorp2 as varchar) AND A.acorp1 + CAST(A.acorp2 as varchar) Like concat('%',#{cltcd},'%') AND B.misdate between #{frdate} and #{todate} ORDER BY B.misdate, B.misnum, B.seq

select B.cltcd as cltcd, Left(B.misdate,4) + '-' + substring(B.misdate, 5,2)+ '-' + substring(B.misdate, 7,2) as misdate, B.misnum, B.seq, B.pcode, B.pname, B.psize, B.punit, B.qty, B.uamt, B.samt, B.addamt, B.amt, A.acorp, pbonsa, pmodel, pcolor from TB_DA026 B WITH (NOLOCK) , cif A WITH (NOLOCK) , TB_DA025 C WITH (NOLOCK) where B.misdate + B.misnum = C.misdate + C.misnum AND isnull(C.delflag, '') <> 'Y' AND B.cltcd = A.acorp1 + CAST(A.acorp2 as varchar) AND C.cltcd = A.acorp1 + CAST(A.acorp2 as varchar) AND A.acorp1 + CAST(A.acorp2 as varchar) Like concat('%',#{cltcd},'%') AND B.misdate between #{frdate} and #{todate} ORDER BY B.misdate, B.misnum, B.seq
mapper.insert: insert into TB_DA023 (custcd, spjangcd, cltcd, misgubun, misdate, misnum, contamt, gubun, yyyymm, perid, amt, addamt, misamt, billkind, taxcls, taxgubun, tax_spdate, tax_spnum, remark, bigo, vatemail, vatpernm, spjangnum, delflag ) values ('EEAN', 'ZZ', #{cltcd}, #{misgubun}, #{misdate}, #{misnum}, #{contamt}, #{gubun}, #{yyyymm}, #{perid}, #{amt}, #{addamt}, #{misamt}, #{billkind}, #{taxcls}, #{taxgubun}, '', '', #{remark}, #{bigo}, #{vatemail}, #{vatpernm}, #{spjangnum}, 'N' )

insert into TB_DA025 (custcd, spjangcd, cltcd, misgubun, misdate, misnum, contamt, gubun, yyyymm, perid, amt, addamt, misamt, billkind, taxcls, taxgubun, tax_spdate, tax_spnum, remark, bigo, vatemail, vatpernm, spjangnum, delflag ) values ('EEAN', 'ZZ', #{cltcd}, #{misgubun}, #{misdate}, #{misnum}, #{contamt}, #{gubun}, #{yyyymm}, #{perid}, #{amt}, #{addamt}, #{misamt}, #{billkind}, #{taxcls}, #{taxgubun}, '', '', #{remark}, #{bigo}, #{vatemail}, #{vatpernm}, #{spjangnum}, 'N' )

insert into TB_DA024 (custcd, spjangcd, cltcd, misdate, misnum, seq, pcode, pname, psize, punit, qty, uamt, samt, addamt, amt, indate, inperid, pbonsa, pmodel, pcolor ) values ('EEAN', 'ZZ', #{cltcd}, #{misdate}, #{misnum}, #{seq}, #{pcode}, #{pname}, #{psize}, #{punit}, #{qty}, #{uamt}, #{samt}, #{addamt}, #{amt}, #{indate}, #{inperid} , #{pbonsa} , #{pmodel} , #{pcolor} )

insert into TB_DA026 (custcd, spjangcd, cltcd, misdate, misnum, seq, pcode, pname, psize, punit, qty, uamt, samt, addamt, amt, indate, inperid, pbonsa, pmodel, pcolor ) values ('EEAN', 'ZZ', #{cltcd}, #{misdate}, #{misnum}, #{seq}, #{pcode}, #{pname}, #{psize}, #{punit}, #{qty}, #{uamt}, #{samt}, #{addamt}, #{amt}, #{indate}, #{inperid} , #{pbonsa} , #{pmodel} , #{pcolor} )

insert into TB_IA011 (custcd, spjangcd, cltcd, spdate, spnum, suprice,taxamt, remarks, pubdate, booknum, bookho, serinum, occuclafi, pubdatey, pubdatem, pubdated, artclnm1, artclnm2, artclnm3 , artclnm4,standard1, standard2, standard3, standard4, qty1, qty2, qty3, qty4, uprice1, uprice2, uprice3, uprice4, suprice1, suprice2, suprice3, suprice4, taxamt1, taxamt2, taxamt3, taxamt4, delflag, cltnm, prenm, saupnum, prenum, biztypenm, bisitemnm, zipcd, cltadres, taxmail, taxflag, misdate, misnum ) values ( 'EEAN', 'ZZ', #{cltcd}, #{spdate}, #{spnum}, #{suprice}, #{taxamt}, #{remarks}, #{pubdate}, #{booknum}, #{bookho}, #{serinum}, #{occuclafi}, #{pubdatey}, #{pubdatem}, #{pubdated}, #{artclnm1}, #{artclnm2}, #{artclnm3} , #{artclnm4} , #{artclnm3} , #{standard1} , #{standard2} , #{standard3} , #{standard4}, #{qty1} , #{qty2} , #{qty3} , #{qty4} , #{uprice1} , #{uprice2} , #{uprice3} , #{uprice4} , #{suprice1}, #{suprice2}, #{suprice3}, #{suprice4}, #{taxamt1}, #{taxamt2}, #{taxamt3}, #{taxamt4}, #{delflag}, #{cltnm}, #{prenm}, #{saupnum}, #{prenum}, #{biztypenm}, #{bisitemnm}, #{zipcd}, #{cltadres}, #{taxmail}, #{taxflag}, #{misdate}, #{misnum} )

insert into TB_IA012 (custcd, spjangcd, odnum, spdate, spnum, moday, artclnm, standard, qty, uprice, suprice, taxamt, remarks ) values ( 'EEAN', 'ZZ', #{odnum}, #{spdate}, #{spnum}, #{moday}, #{artclnm}, #{standard}, #{qty}, #{uprice}, #{suprice}, #{taxamt}, #{remarks} )
mapper.delete: delete from tb_da024 where misdate = #{misdate} and misnum = #{misnum} and seq = #{seq} and cltcd = #{cltcd}
delete from tb_da026 where misdate = #{misdate} and misnum = #{misnum} and seq = #{seq} and cltcd = #{cltcd}
